alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta; Haralson; Heard; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 5:32PM EDT until August 06 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haralson County in northwestern Georgia... Carroll County in northwestern Georgia... Heard County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Coweta County in west central Georgia... Western Polk County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 532 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Borden Springs to near Bowdon to Cragford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Cedartown, Buchanan, Franklin, Bremen, Temple, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Waco, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Corinth, Esom Hill, Clem, Abilene, John Tanner State Park, Glenn, and Blackjack Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
